苨字的基本解释

苨
nǐ
〔苨苨〕茂盛。
〔荞苨〕中药草名，亦称“甜桔梗”。

苨字的汉语字典释义
暂无汉字(苨)的汉语大字典的解释
苨字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　苨； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1024第02
【唐韻】奴禮切【集韻】乃禮切，?音禰。【爾雅·釋草】苨，菧苨。【註】薺苨也。【劉勰·新論】愚與直相像，若薺苨之亂人參。　又通作泥。【詩·大雅】維葉泥泥。【釋文】張揖作苨苨。【博雅】苨苨，茂盛也。

考證：〔【詩·大雅】維葉泥泥。【疏】張揖作苨苨。〕　謹照原文疏改釋文。
苨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
苨字的起名意思

中药草名，也指（草木）茂盛。

Marmoset
Basic explanation of words
Marmoset
nǐ
〔Marmoset〕 luxuriantly.
〔Buckwheat marmoset〕 Chinese herb name, also known as "sweet platycodon".
Marmoset
Chinese dictionary definition of words
There is no Chinese character (苨) in the Chinese Dictionary for the time being.
Marmoset
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　苨; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1024 No. 02
[Tang Yun] Nu Liqie [Jiyun] is Liqie, and you are the sound of you. 【Erya·Shucao】Tamarin, Tamarin. [Note] Marmosets are also. [Liu Xie·New Theory] Stupid and straight are alike, like the chaotic ginseng of the marmoset.　Through making mud again. 【Poetry·Daya】Weiye mud. 【Explanation】Zhang Yi works as a marmoset. [Bo Ya] Marmosets are also lush. Textual research: [[Poetry·Daya] Weiye Clay. [Sparse] Zhang Yi works as a marmoset. 〕　I would like to modify the interpretation based on the original text.
